TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIInterfaceOrientationExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions methods for the UIInterfaceOrientation enumeration.

remarks.para: The extensions methods in this class provide some convenience methods to use with enumerations of the UIInterfaceOrientation type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsLandscape (this UIKit.UIInterfaceOrientation orientation);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsLandscape(valuetype UIKit.UIInterfaceOrientation orientation) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if the origination is one of the landscape values.
Docs.returns: true if this is a landscape orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsPortrait (this UIKit.UIInterfaceOrientation orientation);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsPortrait(valuetype UIKit.UIInterfaceOrientation orientation) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if the orientation is one of the portrait orientations.
Docs.returns: true if this is a portrait orientation.
